name: Webp Converter
author: aviplugins.com

sections.description:
Speed up your website by serving images in WebP format. This plugin will replace files in standard JPEG, PNG and GIF formats with WebP format.

After installation go to plugin settings and enable webp images. You can convert all images in Media Library or convert selected images only. The plugin will reduce the size of the image without compromising image quality.

The plugin will ditect if Webp images are supported by the client browser or not and then serve the images accordingly. 100 images can be converted per month.

Webp Converter PRO

The PRO version can convert 500 images per month. Get it for USD 2.00 Check it out here.

Post your plugin related queries at https://www.aviplugins.com/support.php
sections.installation:
1. Upload webp-converter.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Click on Webp Convert and start converting images.
sections.faq:
For any kind of problem

  1. Please email me at demoforafo@gmail.com for any queries or Contact me here https://www.aviplugins.com/support.php
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Now embedded images can be served as webp using .htaccess

1.0.0

  • this is the first release.
